l3m.bdd.outils.xml

Class XMLUtil.DocumentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • l3m.bdd.outils.xml.XMLUtil.DocumentFactory
  • Enclosing class:
    XMLUtil

    public static class XMLUtil.DocumentFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner class to create DOM document with various methods including URL, XSL transformation and files.

      • fromString

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document fromString(java.lang.String xmlString)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        build a DOM Document from a String: this methods parse a String that should represent an XML serialisation.
        Parameters:
        xmlString - the XML document as a String
        Returns:
        the DOM Document build from the XML document.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • fromURL

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document fromURL(java.net.URL url)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        build a DOM Document using a URL: this methods download the URL in a String.

        Note: the URL should refer to an XML document.

        Parameters:
        url - the XML document to download
        Returns:
        the DOM Document build from the XML document.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • fromTransformation

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document fromTransformation(javax.xml.transform.Transformer t,
                                                      org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                               throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Cette méthode applique une transformation à un Document DOM et renvoie le document transformé sous la forme d'une chaine de caractères (String).
        Parameters:
        doc - the DOM document to process by XSLT
        t - a transformer to be used to process the Document doc
        Returns:
        a Document resulting from the XSL transformation of doc
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • fromXSLTransformation

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document fromXSLTransformation(javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource xslStreamSource,
                                                         org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        return the DOM document resulting from of an XSL transformation of a source DOM document
        Parameters:
        xslStreamSource - a source containing the XSL stylesheet
        doc - the DOM document to process by XSLT
        Returns:
        the DOM document resulting from the XSL transformation of doc as written in the stylesheet xslFileName
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • fromXSLTransformation

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document fromXSLTransformation(java.lang.String xslFileName,
                                                         org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        return the DOM document resulting from of an XSL transformation of a source DOM document
        Parameters:
        xslFileName - name of the file containing the XSL stylesheet
        doc - the DOM document to process by XSLT
        Returns:
        the DOM document resulting from the XSL transformation of doc as written in the stylesheet xslFileName
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
